meanings.definition: A moth of the family Geometridae, typically having slender bodies and broad wings.
meanings.sent1: The geometrid fluttered gracefully through the garden.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a geometrid resting on a leaf in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The geometrid decided to take a nap on a flower petal.
meanings.sent4: Her dance was as light and elegant as a geometrid's flight.
meanings.sent5: The geometrid's wings shimmered in the sunlight, mesmerizing all who saw.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the family Geometridae.
meanings.sent1: The geometrid caterpillar crawled slowly along the branch.
meanings.sent2: The geometrid patterns on the wings were intricate and beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The geometrid-inspired artwork added a unique touch to the exhibit.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as precise and delicate as a geometrid's flight.
meanings.sent5: The geometrid-like design of the building blended nature with architecture seamlessly.
